name: BATTLE THUNDER FRONT 《战雷前线》
description:
BATTLE THUNDER FRONT is a unique casual turn-based war game.
The background of the game takes the Vietnam War as the theme, and players can fight in the form of small teams or large forces.
The game also supports personalized configuration of battle mode for playing
There are 7 major professions in total, including Forward, Main Force, Fire, Blast, Sniper, Medicine, Signal.
225 cards, 250 background landscape pictures, close to 78 weapons, multiple game modes can be freely selected.
developers: Two Thousand and one entertainment studios
publishers: Two Thousand and one entertainment studios
